--- insert_values_default.sql
insert foo (foo, bar)
values (1, default)
--- AST
&parser.Insert{
  pos:       0,
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  7,
    end:  10,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  Columns: []*parser.Ident{
    &parser.Ident{
      pos:  12,
      end:  15,
      Name: "foo",
    },
    &parser.Ident{
      pos:  17,
      end:  20,
      Name: "bar",
    },
  },
  Input: &parser.ValuesInput{
    pos:  22,
    Rows: []*parser.ValuesRow{
      &parser.ValuesRow{
        pos:    29,
        end:    41,
        Values: []*parser.DefaultExpr{
          &parser.DefaultExpr{
            pos:     30,
            Default: false,
            Expr:    &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   30,
              end:   31,
              Base:  10,
              Value: "1",
            },
          },
          &parser.DefaultExpr{
            pos:     33,
            Default: true,
            Expr:    nil,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
INSERT INTO foo (foo, bar)
VALUES (1, DEFAULT)
